shani eerashtakaya aakara thunaki. 1)jamma(janma) eerashtakaya (chandra eerashtakaya kiyada hadunwayi.) 2)lagna eerashtakaya 3)ashtama eerashtakaya 1)jamma(janma) eerashtakaya (chandra eerashtakaya) janma eerashtakaya yanu upathedi chandraya siti rashiyata gochara gamanin shani grahaya paminimayi.shani grahaya samanyayen ek rashiyak thula wasara deka hamarak gaman karayi.shani grahaya sadu sitina rashiyata pera rashiye(sadugen 12 wannata) gaman karana wasara deka hamara janma(chandra) eerashtakaye mul awadiya ha shani sadugen dewanne gaman karana wasara deka hamara janma eerashtakaye awasan awadiya lesath salake.ee anuwa janma eerashtakaye sampurna kalaya wasara hatha hamaraki.

hitapu yuda hamudapathi sarath fonseka mahatha athadanguwata ganima sambandhayen siwil nithiya kriyathmaka karana lesa liyon foks mahatha mehi di mathu kala panaya wiya.shri lanka widesha katayuthu amathiwaraya ha eksath rajadhaniye chaya aarakshaka lekamwaraya athara dwiparshwiya washayen sakachcha pawathi athara uthuru ha nagenahira sanwardhana katayuthu ji. es. pi. sahanaya aadi wadagath karunu rashiyak kerehi awadhanaya yomu karini.thrasthawadaya parajaya karamin prajathanthrawadaya thahawuru kota rate sanwardhanaya wenuwen idiriyata gaman karana mohothaka eksath rajadhaniyen shri lankawata sahayogaya labena bawath wides gatha shri lankika demala prajawage unnathiya wenuwen mehi di sakachcha kala bawath amathi rohitha bogollagama mahatha kiwe ya.shri lankawe uthuru ha nagenahira pradeshayanhi yatithala pahasukam sanwardhanaya kota ee ee pradeshawala janathawage aadayam mattama thahawuru kirima pilibandawa da me sakachchawe di awadhanaya yomu kala bawa ki widesha katayuthu amathiwaraya pawathi janadhipathiwaranayen laksha 18ka wadi chanda sankhyawak laba jayagrahanaya kirima aithihasika bawath sandahan kaleya.shri lankawe subasiddhiya wenuwen eksath rajadhaniye purna sahayogaya laba dena bawa eksath rajadhaniye chaya aarakshaka lekam aacharya liyon foks mahatha kiya sitiye ya.sancharayak sandaha diwayinata pamini aacharya liyon foks mahatha uthuru pradeshaye pihiti abhyanthara washayen awathan wu pudgalayan wesena thawakalika kandawuruwala warthamana thaththwaya daka bala gaththe ya.
